meanings.sent1: After a few sips of wine, she felt tipsier than usual.
meanings.sent2: The more beer he drank, the tipsier he became.
meanings.sent3: Trying to walk straight while feeling tipsier than a wobbly jellyfish was quite a challenge.
meanings.sent4: The room spun around her, making her feel tipsier than a rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent5: Her giggles and unsteady steps revealed just how tipsy and tipsier she was getting.

meanings.sent1: The tipsier table in the restaurant made it hard to balance the drinks.
meanings.sent2: The boat rocked gently on the tipsier waves of the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The leaning tower looked even tipsier after the earthquake.
meanings.sent4: The old chair was so tipsier that it threatened to fall over with the slightest touch.
meanings.sent5: The tipsier tree swayed in the wind, ready to tip over at any moment.
